text: i'm yvonne ivan vetkover i am the
country general manager of aws
switzerland and i joined aws a little
bit more than two and a half years ago
on one hand obviously i represent the
aws entity in country which means i'm
managing relationship with important
stakeholders i'm working with several
internal teams as well to expand our
presence in switzerland and that's one
part of my job the second part is that
i'm also the leader for the commercials
business in switzerland so i'm working
with customers across all segments
actually to help them advance their
digitization agenda leveraging cloud
technology leveraging aws methodologies
as well so that they can continue to
innovate and serve their customers
better i was working in technology for
more than 20 years already i'm an
engineer by education so one of the
reasons for joining adobe is that i
wanted to work in an organization in a
company that is so cutting edge when it
comes to technology and innovation
the other reason is that i wanted to be
in a place where i can actually be a
pioneer where i can be an entrepreneur
so for me it was important to be able to
work on innovation work closer to
customers as well and really being able
to invent both at customer as well as
internally i didn't expect the company
to really live by the cultural principle
that they are sharing with the rest of
the world what many companies say that
their customers obsessed many companies
say that they want to think big many
companies say that they want to invent
and simplify but for me the biggest
surprise was actually being in the
organization being within aws to realize
that this leadership principle this
cultural attribute of the companies are
real and they're part of everything we
do on a day-to-day basis switzerland is
one of the most innovative countries in
the world but there's absolutely no need
to be a techie if you wish or to have a
technology background we have so many
different roles at aws we have marketing
team we have sales teams so the
opportunity to join aws is more about
being interested being in love with what
technology can do for others right for
communities for companies and for
individuals this is what you need to
bring as a prerequisite but other than
that
everybody in any background is welcome
we want builders to come help us build
solutions to some of the biggest and
smallest problem of this time and
universe is the right place to do that
and no need to have an engineering
degree but to be passionate about your
customers and be passionate about
inventing
you
